languages.text: Дознаватель Хейнрикс ван Калокс больше суток не выходил из своей каюты, после чего, ослабевший от кровопотери и истощения, обратился в медицинский отсек за помощью. Под затылком, в шее и спине мужчины появились разверстые кровоточащие раны. Когда один из медикусов заметил, что расположение стигматов напоминает размещение нейронных разъемов на теле пилотов Имперских Рыцарей, ван Калокс в самых некорректных выражениях рекомендовал ему держать досужие выдумки при себе.

Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A chirurgeon remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.
languages.original_text: Дознаватель Хейнрикс ван Калокс больше суток не выходил из своей каюты, после чего, ослабевший от кровопотери и истощения, обратился в медицинский отсек за помощью. Под затылком, в шее и спине мужчины появились разверстые кровоточащие раны. Когда один из медикусов заметил, что расположение стигматов напоминает размещение нейронных разъемов на теле пилотов Имперских Рыцарей, ван Калокс в самых некорректных выражениях рекомендовал ему держать досужие выдумки при себе.

traits.locale_text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox hadn't left his cabin for days, after which he went to the medical bay for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds under the back of his head and on the back of his neck. When a medicus pointed out the location of the stigmata resembles the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, van Calox resorted to strong language and suggested the man keeps his idle fantasies to himself.

There were open and bleeding wounds under the back of his head and on the back of his neck. When a medicus pointed out the location of the stigmata resembles the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, van Calox resorted to strong language and suggested the man keeps his idle fantasies to himself.

Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medical bay for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A medicus remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.

There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A medicus remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.

Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A chirurgeon remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.

languages.text: 审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯在自己的舱室里整整呆了二十四个小时。在这之后，他由于失血与疲惫而变得虚弱不堪，不得不前往医疗站寻求帮助。他的后颈、脖子与背部有着大量开放性的出血伤口。某位外科医生说，这些创口的位置与帝国骑士驾驶员身上的神经连接器的位置十分相似。听到这些话之后，冯·卡洛克斯瞬间变得极其粗鲁，暗示那个人赶紧收起他那些毫无根据的胡思乱想。
languages.original_text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A chirurgeon remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.

traits.locale_text: 审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯在自己的舱室里整整呆了二十四个小时。在这之后，他由于失血与疲惫而变得虚弱不堪，不得不前往医疗站寻求帮助。他的后颈、脖子与背部有着大量开放性的出血伤口。某位外科医生说，这些创口的位置与帝国骑士驾驶员身上的神经连接器的位置十分相似。听到这些话之后，冯·卡洛克斯瞬间变得极其粗鲁，暗示那个人赶紧收起他那些毫无根据的胡思乱想。

languages.text: El interrogador Heinrix van Calox no salió de su camarote durante 24 horas, tras las cuales acudió a las instalaciones medicae en busca de ayuda, debilitado por la pérdida de sangre y el agotamiento. Tenía heridas abiertas que sangraban en la nuca, el cuello y la espalda. Un cirujano comentó que la ubicación de los estigmas se parecía a la de los conectores neuronales en los cuerpos de los pilotos de los Caballeros Imperiales, y van Calox sugirió enérgicamente y de la forma más indecorosa que el hombre se guardara sus estúpidas fantasías para sí mismo.
languages.original_text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A chirurgeon remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.

Tenía heridas abiertas que sangraban en la nuca, el cuello y la espalda. Un cirujano comentó que la ubicación de los estigmas se parecía a la de los conectores neuronales en los cuerpos de los pilotos de los Caballeros Imperiales, y van Calox sugirió enérgicamente y de la forma más indecorosa que el hombre se guardara sus estúpidas fantasías para sí mismo.

languages.text: インテロゲイターのハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、自身のキャビンを24時間離れずに、その後、貧血と疲労で体が弱り、助けを求めてメディケア施設へ足を運んだ。彼のうなじ、首、背中はパックリ開いた傷口から出血している。チラージョンは、聖痕の位置がインペリアルナイトのパイロットの体にある神経コネクタの配置に似ていると発言して、ヴァン・カロックスはフンッと思い切り無作法に、その無駄な妄想は自分の頭にとどめておけと言い放った。
languages.original_text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A chirurgeon remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.

traits.locale_text: インテロゲイターのハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、自身のキャビンを24時間離れずに、その後、貧血と疲労で体が弱り、助けを求めてメディケア施設へ足を運んだ。彼のうなじ、首、背中はパックリ開いた傷口から出血している。チラージョンは、聖痕の位置がインペリアルナイトのパイロットの体にある神経コネクタの配置に似ていると発言して、ヴァン・カロックスはフンッと思い切り無作法に、その無駄な妄想は自分の頭にとどめておけと言い放った。

languages.text: L'interrogateur Heinrix van Calox est resté dans sa cabine pendant 24 heures avant de se rendre à la medicae pour obtenir de l'aide, affaibli par la perte de sang. Il présentait des plaies ouvertes au niveau de la nuque, du cou et du dos. Un chirurgeon a remarqué que les stigmates sont apparus aux emplacements utilisés pour les connecteurs neuronaux des pilotes de Chevaliers impériaux, mais van Calox lui a vivement conseillé de garder ses affabulations pour lui-même.
languages.original_text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A chirurgeon remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.

traits.locale_text: L'interrogateur Heinrix van Calox est resté dans sa cabine pendant 24 heures avant de se rendre à la medicae pour obtenir de l'aide, affaibli par la perte de sang. Il présentait des plaies ouvertes au niveau de la nuque, du cou et du dos. Un chirurgeon a remarqué que les stigmates sont apparus aux emplacements utilisés pour les connecteurs neuronaux des pilotes de Chevaliers impériaux, mais van Calox lui a vivement conseillé de garder ses affabulations pour lui-même.

languages.text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox hat seine Kabine 24 Stunden lang nicht verlassen und hat dann die Medicae-Station aufgesucht, um sich behandeln zu lassen, geschwächt von Blutverlust und Erschöpfung. Er hatte offene, blutende Wanden im Genick, am Hals und am Rücken. Ein Chirurgeum merkte an, dass die Position der Stigmata der Platzierung neuraler Konnektoren an den Körpern von Imperialer-Ritter-Piloten ähnelte. Van Calox legte dem Mann nachdrücklich und mit sehr unziemlichen Worten nahe, er solle seine Fantasien für sich behalten.
languages.original_text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. languages.text: Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox, 24 saat boyunca kabininden çıkmadı. Daha sonra bitkin ve kan kaybetmiş hâlde sıhhiyeye yardım istemeye gitti. Ensesinde, boynunda ve sırtında açık ve kanayan yaralar vardı. Bir cerrah; bu stigmataların yerlerinin, İmparatorluk Şövalyesi pilotlarının vücutlarındaki sinirsel bağlayıcıların konumsal düzenine benzediğini belirtti. Van Calox, bu yorumu kabaca safsata olarak nitelendirip cerrahın düşüncelerini kendine saklamasını önerdi.
languages.original_text: Interrogator Heinrix van Calox did not leave his cabin for 24 hours, after which he went to the medicae facility for help, weakened by blood loss and exhaustion. There were open and bleeding wounds at his nape, neck, and back. A chirurgeon remarked that the location of the stigmata resembled the placement of neural connectors on the bodies of Imperial Knight pilots, and van Calox forcefully and most indecorously suggested the man keep his idle fantasies to himself.
